title: Stage Lv6-P4-S26
description: Level 6 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: When analyzed, the data showed an error.
Having completed the analysis, we submitted the report.
learning_points: Level 6 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: When analyzed, the data showed an error.

sentences.kr: 분석을 완료한 후, 우리는 보고서를 제출했습니다.
sentences.en: Having completed the analysis, we submitted the report.

sentences.kr: 경험이 있어서, 그녀는 상황을 잘 처리했습니다.
sentences.en: Being experienced, she handled the situation well.
Having been carefully reviewed, the proposal was approved.

sentences.kr: 시간에 제약이 있어서, 우리는 우선순위를 정해야 했습니다.
sentences.en: Being constrained by time, we had to set priorities.

sentences.kr: 모든 준비를 마친 후, 팀은 프레젠테이션을 시작했습니다.
sentences.en: Having finished all preparations, the team started the presentation.

sentences.kr: 시장에서 테스트되었을 때, 제품은 좋은 반응을 얻었습니다.
sentences.en: When tested in the market, the product received positive feedback.

sentences.kr: 예산 제약이 있어서, 우리는 범위를 축소해야 했습니다.
sentences.en: Being budget-constrained, we had to reduce the scope.
